verses.verse: Now<WG1161> as touching<WG4012> things offered unto idols<WG1494>, we know<WG1492> that<WG3754> we all<WG3956> have<WG2192> knowledge<WG1108>. Knowledge<WG1108> puffeth up<WG5448>, but<WG1161> charity<WG26> edifieth<WG3618>.
And<WG1161> if any man<WG1536> think<WG1380> that he knoweth<WG1492> any thing<WG5100>, he knoweth<WG1097> nothing<WG3762> yet<WG3764> as<WG2531> he ought<WG1163> to know<WG1097>.
But<WG1161> if any man<WG1536> love<WG25> God<WG2316>, the same<WG3778> is known<WG1097> of<WG5259> him<WG846>.

As concerning<WG4012> therefore<WG3767> the eating<WG1035> of those things that are offered in sacrifice unto idols<WG1494>, we know<WG1492> that<WG3754> an idol<WG1497> is nothing<WG3762> in<WG1722> the world<WG2889>, and<WG2532> that<WG3754> there is none<WG3762> other<WG2087> God<WG2316> but<WG1508> one<WG1520>.

For<WG1063> though<WG1512><WG2532> there be<WG1526> that are called<WG3004> gods<WG2316>, whether<WG1535> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772> or<WG1535> in<WG1909> earth<WG1093>, (as<WG5618> there be<WG1526> gods<WG2316> many<WG4183>, and<WG2532> lords<WG2962> many<WG4183>,)

But<WG235> to us<WG2254> there is but one<WG1520> God<WG2316>, the Father<WG3962>, of<WG1537> whom<WG3739> are all things<WG3956>, and<WG2532> we<WG2249> in<WG1519> him<WG846>; and<WG2532> one<WG1520> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547>, by<WG1223> whom<WG3739> are all things<WG3956>, and<WG2532> we<WG2249> by<WG1223> him<WG846>.

Howbeit<WG235> there is not<WG3756> in<WG1722> every man<WG3956> that knowledge<WG1108>: for<WG1161> some<WG5100> with conscience<WG4893> of the idol<WG1497> unto<WG2193> this hour<WG737> eat<WG2068> it as<WG5613> a thing offered unto an idol<WG1494>; and<WG2532> their<WG846> conscience<WG4893> being<WG5607> weak<WG772> is defiled<WG3435>.

But<WG1161> meat<WG1033> commendeth<WG3936> us<WG2248> not<WG3756> to God<WG2316>: for<WG1063> neither<WG3777>, if<WG1437> we eat<WG5315>, are we the better<WG4052>; neither<WG3777>, if<WG3362> we eat<WG5315> not<WG3362>, are we the worse<WG5302>.
But<WG1161> take heed<WG991> lest<WG3381> by any means<WG4458> this<WG3778> liberty<WG1849> of yours<WG5216> become<WG1096> a stumblingblock<WG4348> to them that are weak<WG770>.

For<WG1063> if<WG1437> any man<WG5100> see<WG1492> thee<WG4571> which<WG3588> hast<WG2192> knowledge<WG1108> sit at meat<WG2621> in<WG1722> the idol's temple<WG1493>, shall<WG3618> not<WG3780> the conscience<WG4893> of him<WG846> which is<WG5607> weak<WG772> be emboldened<WG3618><WG1519> to eat<WG2068> those things which are offered to idols<WG1494>;
And<WG2532> through<WG1909> thy<WG4674> knowledge<WG1108> shall<WG622> the weak<WG770> brother<WG80> perish<WG622>, for<WG1223> whom<WG3739> Christ<WG5547> died<WG599>?
But<WG1161> when ye sin<WG264> so<WG3779> against<WG1519> the brethren<WG80>, and<WG2532> wound<WG5180> their<WG846> weak<WG770> conscience<WG4893>, ye sin<WG264> against<WG1519> Christ<WG5547>.

Wherefore<WG1355>, if<WG1487> meat<WG1033> make<WG4624> my<WG3450> brother<WG80> to offend<WG4624>, I will eat<WG5315> no<WG3364> flesh<WG2907> while the world standeth<WG1519><WG165>, lest<WG3363> I make<WG4624> my<WG3450> brother<WG80> to offend<WG4624>.
